page.title: 10LIFE AND TIMES, RUGELEY
page.content: Most people live and work in a routine during the working week (Monday to Friday). School times are 9.00am to 4.00pm but vary by 10 minutes to allow parents to go from school to school. Lunch time is about 75 minutes. Shops open from 9.00am to 5.30pm generally but newsagents open from 7.00am and close later. Most shops close on Sundays but about 5 general stores around the town as well as garden centres, DIY stores and discount warehouses (carpets and furniture) open long hours every day. Working times are about 8.30am to 5.00pm but many people work shifts at the colliery and power stations. Public houses open for 3 hours at lunch time and from 6.00pm to 11.00pm, with reduced times on Sunday. In the evening many people watch television which closes down at about midnight.
